data.name: Monster Girl Dormitory - Patch
data.detailed_description: This DLC contains 5 new pictures, which can be seen after the characters are put into the magic circle after the decryption is completed.
data.about_the_game: This DLC contains 5 new pictures, which can be seen after the characters are put into the magic circle after the decryption is completed.
data.short_description: Relax puzzle games to keep you in a good mood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
